entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
